Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.auth

Interface SPFCallback

All Known Implementing Classes:
DMARCValidator
public interface SPFCallback
Callback interface for asynchronous SPF check results.

This interface enables non-blocking SPF validation. The callback is invoked when the SPF check completes, which may involve multiple DNS lookups for mechanisms like "include" or "redirect".

Author:
Chris Burdess

      Called when an SPF check completes.
      Parameters:
      result - the SPF check result
      explanation - optional explanation text from the SPF record, or null
